derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek enkaustikos, from enkaiein 'burn in', from en- 'in' + kaiein 'to burn'

means.word_mean: 1. a paint consisting of pigment mixed with melted beeswax; it is fixed with heat after application
